Why is English Important?

English is the dominant business language around the world and considered a necessity in many companies in order to operate in the global market. On a local level, English is vital for you and your business to be able to communicate effectively with its many foreign visitors; be it tourists, expats or international businessmen.

Learn more

My job requires me to work late. Once home, my children, house, wife and daily life all need attention as well. That´s the reason why I attend English classes at work. For me classes during lunch at the office are the best way for me to improve, or at least maintain my ability to communicate in English.

- Jose-Manuel, 48, Telefonica Communications

The classes are very dynamic and well structured. We often spend time discussing current issues or topics related to our personal English needs. Conclusion: Highly recommended!

- Antonio, 43, Telefonica Communications

I was signed up at your typical English Academy for two years and the experience was terrible. I was wasting my money and my English wasn’t improving. With EBA I’ve had the exact opposite experience. Now I find myself looking forward to my Tuesday and Thursday break when I attend English class. I wouldn’t recommend any other option to improve your English!

- Juan-Vicente, 43, Telefonica Communications

Whenever I have a doubt, a specific problem or question, I turn to my EBA teacher, Michael to help me with it. He’s always able to explain things to me in an easy way and then find ways to make me use what I’ve learnt to ensure I remember it. I’ve learnt a lot with EBA! Furthermore, having classes where I choose is extremely convenient and saves me a ton of time!

- Lourdes, 45, Graphic Designer

I was tired of traditional English school methods that focused on grammar and writing. I decided to have lessons with EBA and I couldn't have chosen a better option. We covered a variety of topics, I learned very useful idioms and slang expressions that have helped me excel in my career and social life.

- Teresa, 22, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid

I have classes with EBA once per week for an hour each time. The hour always seems to pass by so quickly, yet we seem to cover so much. Classes with EBA have helped me with my studies and have prepared me for a career that I desire.

- Henar, 22, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
